SourceAnalyzer.Name: StyleCop.KRules.UsingOutsideNamespaceRule
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Requires that using be placed outside the namespace.

Rule.Name: UsingDirectivesMustBePlacedOutsideNamespace
Rule.Context: A using directive should always be placed outside the namespace.
Rule.Description: Validates that the code does not put using directives inside of a namespace declaration.
